verses.verse: The word <WH1697> that came to Jeremiah <WH3414> from Jehovah <WH3068> in the tenth <WH6224> year <WH8141> of Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, which was the eighteenth <WH6240> year <WH8141> of Nebuchadrezzar <WH5019>.

Now at that time the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>'s army <WH2428> was besieging <WH6696> Jerusalem <WH3389>; and Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030> was shut up <WH3607> in the court <WH2691> of the guard <WH4307>, which was in the king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>'s house <WH1004>.

For Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> had shut him up <WH3607>, saying <WH559>, Wherefore dost thou prophesy <WH5012>, and say <WH559>, Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>, Behold <WH5414>, I will give this city <WH5892> into the hand <WH3027> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and he shall take it <WH3920>;

and Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> shall not escape <WH4422> out of the hand <WH3027> of the Chaldeans <WH3778>, but shall surely <WH5414> be delivered <WH5414> into the hand <WH3027> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and shall speak <WH1696> with him mouth <WH6310> to mouth <WH6310>, and his eyes <WH5869> shall behold <WH7200> his eyes <WH5869>;

and he shall bring <WH3212> Zedekiah <WH6667> to Babylon <WH894>, and there shall he be until I visit <WH6485> him <WH5002>, saith Jehovah <WH3068>: though ye fight <WH3898> with the Chaldeans <WH3778>, ye shall not prosper <WH6743>?
And Jeremiah <WH3414> said <WH559>, The word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Behold <WH2601>, Hanamel the son <WH1121> of Shallum <WH7967> thine uncle <WH1730> shall come <WH935> unto thee <WH559>, saying, Buy <WH7069> thee my field <WH7704> that is in Anathoth <WH6068>; for the right <WH4941> of redemption <WH1353> is thine to buy it <WH7069>.

So Hanamel <WH2601> mine uncle <WH1730>'s son <WH1121> came <WH935> to me in the court <WH2691> of the guard <WH4307> according to the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068>, and said <WH559> unto me <WH7069>, Buy my field <WH7704>, I pray thee <WH6068>, that is in Anathoth, which is in the land <WH776> of Benjamin <WH1144>; for the right <WH4941> of inheritance <WH3425> is thine <WH1353>, and the redemption is thine <WH7069>; buy it for thyself <WH3045>. Then I knew that this was the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068>.

And I bought <WH7069> the field <WH7704> that was in Anathoth <WH6068> of Hanamel <WH2601> mine uncle <WH1730>'s son <WH1121>, and weighed <WH8254> him the money <WH3701>, even seventeen <WH7651> shekels <WH8255> of silver <WH3701>.
And I subscribed <WH3789> the deed <WH5612>, and sealed <WH2856> it <WH5749>, and called witnesses <WH5707>, and weighed <WH8254> him the money <WH3701> in the balances <WH3976>.
So I took <WH3947> the deed <WH5612> of the purchase <WH4736>, both that which was sealed <WH2856>, according to the law <WH4687> and custom <WH2706>, and that which was open <WH1540>:

and I delivered <WH5414> the deed <WH5612> of the purchase <WH4736> unto Baruch <WH1263> the son <WH1121> of Neriah <WH5374>, the son <WH1121> of Mahseiah <WH4271>, in the presence <WH5869> of Hanamel <WH2601> mine uncle <WH1730>'s son <WH5869>, and in the presence of the witnesses <WH5707> that subscribed <WH3789> the deed <WH5612> of the purchase <WH4736>, before <WH5869> all the Jews <WH3064> that sat <WH3427> in the court <WH2691> of the guard <WH4307>.
And I charged <WH6680> Baruch <WH1263> before <WH5869> them <WH559>, saying,

Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>: Take <WH3947> these deeds <WH5612>, this deed <WH5612> of the purchase <WH4736> which is sealed <WH2856>, and this deed <WH5612> which is open <WH1540>, and put <WH5414> them in an earthen <WH2789> vessel <WH3627>; that they may continue <WH5975> many <WH7227> days <WH3117>.

For thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>: Houses <WH1004> and fields <WH7704> and vineyards <WH3754> shall yet again <WH7069> be bought in this land <WH776>.

Now after <WH310> I had delivered <WH5414> the deed <WH5612> of the purchase <WH4736> unto Baruch <WH1263> the son <WH1121> of Neriah <WH5374>, I prayed <WH6419> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, saying <WH559>,

Ah <WH162> Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>! behold <WH6213>, thou hast made the heavens <WH8064> and the earth <WH776> by thy great <WH1419> power <WH3581> and by thine outstretched <WH5186> arm <WH2220>; there is nothing <WH1697> too hard for thee <WH6381>,

who showest <WH6213> lovingkindness <WH2617> unto thousands <WH505>, and recompensest <WH7999> the iniquity <WH5771> of the fathers <WH1> into the bosom <WH2436> of their children <WH1121> after <WH310> them <WH1419>; the great, the mighty <WH1368> God <WH410>, Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> is his name <WH8034>;

great <WH1419> in counsel <WH6098>, and mighty <WH7227> in work <WH5950>; whose eyes <WH5869> are open <WH6491> upon all the ways <WH1870> of the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120>, to give <WH5414> every one <WH376> according to his ways <WH1870>, and according to the fruit <WH6529> of his doings <WH4611>:

who didst set <WH7760> signs <WH226> and wonders <WH4159> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, even unto this day <WH3117>, both in Israel <WH3478> and among other men <WH120>; and madest <WH6213> thee a name <WH8034>, as at this day <WH3117>;

and didst bring forth <WH3318> thy people <WH5971> Israel <WH3478> out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> with signs <WH226>, and with wonders <WH4159>, and with a strong <WH2389> hand <WH3027>, and with an outstretched arm <WH248>, and with great <WH1419> terror <WH4172>;
and gavest <WH5414> them this land <WH776>, which thou didst swear <WH7650> to their fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> them <WH776>, a land flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>;

and they came in <WH935>, and possessed <WH3423> it <WH8085>, but they obeyed not thy voice <WH6963>, neither walked <WH1980> in thy law <WH8451>; they have done <WH6213> nothing of all that thou commandedst <WH6680> them to do <WH6213>: therefore thou hast caused all this evil <WH7451> to come upon them <WH7122>.

Behold <WH5550>, the mounds, they are come <WH935> unto the city <WH5892> to take <WH3920> it <WH5892>; and the city is given <WH5414> into the hand <WH3027> of the Chaldeans <WH3778> that fight <WH3898> against it <WH6440>, because of the sword <WH2719>, and of the famine <WH7458>, and of the pestilence <WH1698>; and what thou hast spoken <WH1696> is come to pass <WH7200>; and, behold, thou seest it.

And thou hast said <WH559> unto me <WH136>, O Lord Jehovah <WH3069>, Buy <WH7069> thee the field <WH7704> for money <WH3701>, and call <WH5749> witnesses <WH5707>; whereas the city <WH5892> is given <WH5414> into the hand <WH3027> of the Chaldeans <WH3778>.
Then came the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> unto Jeremiah <WH3414>, saying <WH559>,
Behold <WH3068>, I am Jehovah, the God <WH430> of all flesh <WH1320>: is there anything <WH1697> too hard for me <WH6381>?

Therefore thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>: Behold <WH5414>, I will give this city <WH5892> into the hand <WH3027> of the Chaldeans <WH3778>, and into the hand <WH3027> of Nebuchadrezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and he shall take it <WH3920>:

and the Chaldeans <WH3778>, that fight <WH3898> against this city <WH5892>, shall come <WH935> and set <WH3341> this city <WH5892> on fire <WH784>, and burn <WH8313> it <WH1004>, with the houses, upon whose roofs <WH1406> they have offered incense <WH6999> unto Baal <WH1168>, and poured out <WH5258> drink-offerings <WH5262> unto other <WH312> gods <WH430>, to provoke me to anger <WH3707>.

For the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> and the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> have done <WH6213> only that which was evil <WH7451> in my sight <WH5869> from their youth <WH5271>; for the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> have only provoked me to anger <WH3707> with the work <WH4639> of their hands <WH3027>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>.

For this city <WH5892> hath been to me a provocation of mine anger <WH639> and of my wrath <WH2534> from the day <WH3117> that they built <WH1129> it even unto this day <WH3117>; that I should remove <WH5493> it from before my face <WH6440>,

because of all the evil <WH7451> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> and of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063>, which they have done <WH6213> to provoke me to anger <WH3707>, they <WH4428>, their kings, their princes <WH8269>, their priests <WH3548>, and their prophets <WH5030>, and the men <WH376> of Judah <WH3063>, and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem <WH3389>.

And they have turned <WH6437> unto me the back <WH6203>, and not the face <WH6440>: and though I taught <WH3925> them <WH7925>, rising up early and teaching <WH3925> them <WH8085>, yet they have not hearkened to receive <WH3947> instruction <WH4148>.
But they set <WH7760> their abominations <WH8251> in the house <WH1004> which is called <WH7121> by my name <WH8034>, to defile it <WH2930>.

And they built <WH1129> the high places <WH1116> of Baal <WH1168>, which are in the valley <WH1516> of the son <WH1121> of Hinnom <WH2011>, to cause their sons <WH1121> and their daughters <WH1323> to pass <WH5674> through the fire unto Molech <WH4432>; which I commanded <WH6680> them not <WH5927>, neither came it into my mind <WH3820>, that they should do <WH6213> this abomination <WH8441>, to cause Judah <WH3063> to sin <WH2398>.

And now therefore thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, concerning this city <WH5892>, whereof ye say <WH559>, It is given <WH5414> into the hand <WH3027> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> by the sword <WH2719>, and by the famine <WH7458>, and by the pestilence <WH1698>:

Behold <WH6908>, I will gather them out of all the countries <WH776>, whither I have driven <WH5080> them in mine anger <WH639>, and in my wrath <WH2534>, and in great <WH1419> indignation <WH7110>; and I will bring them again <WH7725> unto this place <WH4725>, and I will cause them to dwell <WH3427> safely <WH983>:
and they shall be my people <WH5971>, and I will be their God <WH430>:

and I will give <WH5414> them one <WH259> heart <WH3820> and one <WH259> way <WH1870>, that they may fear <WH3372> me for ever <WH3117>, for the good <WH2896> of them <WH1121>, and of their children after them <WH310>:

and I will make <WH3772> an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285> with them <WH7725>, that I will not turn away from following them <WH310>, to do them good <WH3190>; and I will put <WH5414> my fear <WH3374> in their hearts <WH3824>, that they may not depart from me <WH5493>.
Yea <WH7797>, I will rejoice over them to do them good <WH2895>, and I will plant <WH5193> them in this land <WH776> assuredly <WH571> with my whole heart <WH3820> and with my whole soul <WH5315>.

For thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>: Like as I have brought <WH935> all this great <WH1419> evil <WH7451> upon this people <WH5971>, so will I bring <WH935> upon them all the good <WH2896> that I have promised them <WH1696>.

And fields <WH7704> shall be bought <WH7069> in this land <WH776>, whereof ye say <WH559>, It is desolate <WH8077>, without man <WH120> or beast <WH929>; it is given <WH5414> into the hand <WH3027> of the Chaldeans <WH3778>.

Men shall buy <WH7069> fields <WH7704> for money <WH3701>, and subscribe <WH3789> the deeds <WH5612>, and seal <WH2856> them <WH5749>, and call witnesses <WH5707>, in the land <WH776> of Benjamin <WH1144>, and in the places about <WH5439> Jerusalem <WH3389>, and in the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063>, and in the cities <WH5892> of the hill-country <WH2022>, and in the cities <WH5892> of the lowland <WH8219>, and in the cities <WH5892> of the South <WH5045>: for I will cause their captivity <WH7622> to return <WH7725>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>.
